ANCESTRY.Definition: members of your family who lived a long time ago

ARCHAEOLOGY.Definition: the study of ancient societies by looking at what remains of their buildings, graves, tools etc.

BARBARIAN.Definition: a member of a group from a different country

BARBARIANS.Definition: members of a group from a different country

BLOODTHIRSTY.Definition: wanting to see violent activities happen

DNA.Definition: the substance that contains the genetic information

FERTILITY.Definition: the quality of being able to produce young or fruit

GENEALOGICAL.Definition: relating to the history of families

HALLUCINOGENIC.Definition: a hallucinogenic drug makes you see things that don't exist

HERITAGE.Definition: your heritage is what you inherit

HORNS.Definition: the hard pointed things that grow on the heads of some animals, e.g. cows

IMBALANCE.Definition: a situation where two things aren't equal

INLAND.Definition: in the middle of a country, away from the sea

KEEL.Definition: the long piece of wood along the bottom of a boat

LEGACY.Definition: something that exists because it was left by someone

MONKS.Definition: a member of an all-male religious group that lives apart from society

NAVIGATE.Definition: to find a way to where you want to go

NORSE.Definition: the language spoken by the people of ancient Scandinavia

OARS.Definition: the long pole with a flat part at the end, used to row a boat

OTHERWORLDLY.Definition: relating to thoughts and ideas rather than normal life

OVERPOPULATION.Definition: the situation of having too many people

PAGAN.Definition: belonging to a religion that worships many gods

PASTURES NEW.Definition: new of exciting places or activities

PEASANTS.Definition: people who own or rent small pieces of land

PROFITABLE.Definition: able to produce lots of money

RAPING.Definition: forcing someone to have sex when they do not want to

RUNESTONES.Definition: stones with Old Norse carved on them

SETTLE.Definition: go and live in a new place

SETTLEMENTS.Definition: groups of houses where people live

SETTLERS.Definition: people who arrive somewhere and live there

SOPHISTICATED.Definition: having a lot of knowledge and experience

SPEARS.Definition: a pole with a sharp point

SPOILS.Definition: things taken by a victorious party in war

STABLE.Definition: firmly fixed, not likely to move

STEREOTYPES.Definition: set ideas that people have about what something is like

TASKED.Definition: given a piece of work to do

TRADERS.Definition: people who buy and sell goods

TRANCE.Definition: a temporary condition when someone isn't fully conscious
